name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
schedule:

2     	Consecutive Interpretation (CI) as a Profession
3     	- Public speaking 
- Paraphrasing
4     	Paraphrasing exercises
5    	Sight translation I
6	Sight translation II
7	Memory retention exercises

9    	Mid-term
10    	Short CI on general topics
11    	Short CI on general topics 
12   	Note-taking for CI: Skills and strategies (I)
13   	Note-taking for CI: Skills and strategies (II)
14   	Note-taking for CI: Skills and strategies (III)
15   	Long CI on general topics 
16   	Long CI on economic topics
17   	Long CI on political topics
18   	Final
